amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt rules that significantly improve the employment retention and wages of workforce participants, especially those with significant barriers to employment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 234 (Roll no. 39).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 234 (Roll no. 39).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
